dependencies.description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer
vision and machine learning software library.

dependencies.description:
addict is a Python module that gives you dictionaries whose values are
both gettable and settable using attributes, in addition to standard
item-syntax.
dependencies.name: py-addict

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
MMCV is a foundational python library for computer vision research and
supports many research projects in MMLAB, such as MMDetection and
MMAction.
name: py-mmcv

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
